price: 101. Marka la afuufo buunka, ma jirto qaraabbannimo dhexdooda ah Maalintaas, waxnana isma warsadaan.
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri falā ansāba baynahum yawma-idhin walā yatasāalūna
